mapper.select: SELECT tb_warehousinglog.wlid, tb_user.NAME, tb_property.pname, tb_warehousinglog.spec, tb_warehousinglog.number, tb_type.tname, tb_type2.t2name, tb_warehousinglog.warehousingDate, tb_warehousinglog.imgSrc, tb_warehousinglog.remark FROM tb_warehousinglog LEFT JOIN tb_user ON tb_warehousinglog.NAME = tb_user.uid LEFT JOIN tb_property ON tb_warehousinglog.pname = tb_property.pid LEFT JOIN tb_type ON tb_warehousinglog.type = tb_type.tid LEFT JOIN tb_type2 ON tb_warehousinglog.type2 = tb_type2.t2id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
